info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

;; ANSWER SECTION:

onpes.gouv.fr.	1200	IN	MX	10 pro093001app412.social.gouv.fr.

info.name: NS Record Detection

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 37228
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;onpes.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 37228
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;onpes.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
onpes.gouv.fr.	86400	IN	SOA	a.ns.developpement-durable.gouv.fr. dnsmaster.sante.gouv.fr. 2022111700 21600 1200 3600000 86400

info.name: Apache Tomcat - Open Redirect
author: geeknik
info.description: Apache Tomcat versions prior to 9.0.12, 8.5.34, and 7.0.91 are prone to an open-redirection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.
info.impact: An attacker can redirect users to malicious websites, leading to phishing attacks or the download of malware.
info.remediation: Upgrade to Apache Tomcat version 9.0.12 or later, or apply the relevant patch provided by the Apache Software Foundation.

request:
GET //interact.sh HTTP/1.1
Host: onpes.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently Connection: close Content-Length: 239 Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1 Date: Sun, 30 Jun 2024 04:34:51 GMT Location: https://cnle.gouv.frinteract.sh Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-dicom-onpes-preprod.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=!SNo8lF1IAPbE44JWDPlD0yXzT0UGhlW6spd9r3ibCjvKy1hG+qns88PNKlaJvN2LsKNnWqmcABtja4V6E1+oLfjCykA=; path=/; Httponly; Secure Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains 301 Moved Permanently
